headline: Upslope Capital Management Exited West Pharmaceutical (WST) for Better Opportunities
summary: Upslope Capital Management, an investment management company, released its fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Upslope aims to provide attractive, equity-like returns while reducing market risk and keeping low correlation with traditional equity strategies. The fourth quarter marked a strong end to an exceptional year for the firm. [â€¦]
